reviewText: I watched this movie for the first time a long time ago, I lost it and I just bought it again, I really liked the story, and considering that it was initially a low budget movie it's well done, that's why won so many awards, it's kind of a drama with thriller, someone told me that is something like "thirteen" which I haven't watched, enjoy!

I think over all its an ok movie kind of weird at times and a bad ending I thought it would've been a better movie by the awards it received but the casting was good the way the movie was made was good but the story kind of weird its a movie worth seeing just don't expect too much out of it.
